long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The RFD Quick Deal Chrome extension makes it easier than ever to share great deals with the RedFlagDeals community. Whether you're browsing your favorite retailer or discovering amazing discounts, you can post deals directly to the RFD Hot Deals forum in just a few clicks. No need to manually copy information or switch tabs - RFD Quick Deal extracts deal details for you, simplifying the process and saving you time.

Key Features:
1. One-Click Deal Posting: Post deals to the RFD Hot Deals forum directly from any retailerâ€™s    website.
2. Automatic Deal Extraction: The extension automatically extracts key deal details like the title, price, URL, and images from supported retailers, ensuring accurate deal posts with minimal effort.


Whether you're a seasoned deal hunter or just starting to contribute, RFD Quick Deal is the easiest way to share the best deals with your community. Download now to streamline your deal-posting experience!
